title: FOR SALE: N172 Krock, Horning, Bishop
author: Archive

posts.post_title: FOR SALE: N172 Krock, Horning, Bishop
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhett Yeakley
Following available for sale...
1.)Bill Bishop, Pittsburg (1887) -Graded GAI 1.5, Main reason for grade is the crease through legs that is visible in scan. Nice photo quality. Tougher player. $140.00

2.)Joe Hornung, Boston (1887) -Name mispelled "Horning". Some wear on front, and crease at level of shoulders. Decent photo quality. Some pen writing on original back. $140.00  SOLD 

3.)Gus Krock, Chicago's (1889) -Wear on front, crease at belt. Original back that is a little dirty with some faint remnants of pencil writing. $130.00

Email if interested.
-Rhett

posts.post_title: FOR SALE: N172 Krock, Horning, Bishop
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhett Yeakley
Hornung is sold. I would take $250.00 shipped for the Bishop and Krock together.
-Rhett
